name: Baby
description:
Ren is working on his latest novel in his summer cottage. As he works, pages and dialogue are being written without him knowing. Changing his work constantly. Even worse, his work is beginning to come to life, haunting him in his home. Bringing him to a state of distress. Changing the layout of his cottage, and physically assaulting him.

Ren can come to the conclusion that most of these things are in his head, but there's one being that hasn't appeared in his work, that seems to inhabit the house with him, sporatically becoming hostile.

Ren needs to get out.

The game's production is on hold, simply due to time restraints.
